text:
Eu conseguia sentir os olhares em mim, alguns soltam algumas risadas enquanto ficam atentos a discussão que estava acontecendo, eu escutei a risada de [redacted_name], eu encaro ele e vejo que ele tinha um celular gravando o que acontecia, voltei minha atenção para namorado de [redacted_name].
Sem mais palavras, eu volto a golpear o veículo com fúria contida. Cada golpe era um desabafo contra tudo o que ele representava. Eu sentia uma energia incrível me preenchendo, como se estivesse finalmente me libertando das amarras invisíveis que ele havia colocado em mim.
Quando finalmente parei, minhas mãos estavam doloridas de segurar o pé de cabra com força, o carro dele estava completamente destruído e amassado. Os olhos do namorado de[redacted_name]estavam arregalados, completamente chocado com a ousadia de uma garota que ele sempre julgara como fraca.
trans:
I could feel the stares on me, some let out laughs while paying attention to the discussion that was going on, I heard [redacted_name]'s laugh, Ifaced him and saw that he had a mobile phone recording what was happening , I turned my attention to [redacted_name]'s boyfriend.
Without a word, I hit the vehicle again with restrained fury. Each blow was a vindication against everything it represented. I felt an unbelievable energy filling me as if I were finally freeing myself from the invisible bonds he had placed on me.
When I finally stopped, my hands were hurting from holding the crowbar so tightly, and his car was completely wrecked and dented. [redacted_name]'s boyfriend's eyes were wide open, and he was totally shocked by the audacity of that girl he always deemed weak.
